Class tokFiler 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----tokFiler
public class tokFiler
extends Object
Token file manager.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

tokFiler()
Constructor.

closeTokenFile()
Closes the file that was opened.
createTokenFile()
Creates a new token file.
emitToken(Token)
Writes a token to the file.
getNextToken()
Returns the next token in the open token file.
getProgName()
removeTokenFile()
Get rid of that pesky token file!
retrieveTokenFile(String)
Opens named file if it exists, else writes error message and terminates execution.
seeTokenFile()
Displays entire file on output device.
store(String)
Save file name in fname (memory).

tokFiler 
 public tokFiler()
Constructor.

retrieveTokenFile 
 public void retrieveTokenFile(String filename)
Opens named file if it exists, else writes error message and terminates execution.

Parameters:
filename, - The string name of the file to open
getProgName 
 public String getProgName()
store 
 public void store(String filename)
Save file name in fname (memory). fname must have .extension.

Parameters:
filename, - The name to store in fname
createTokenFile 
 public void createTokenFile()
Creates a new token file. If one exists, this overwrites it.

closeTokenFile 
 public void closeTokenFile()
Closes the file that was opened.

emitToken 
 public void emitToken(Token tok)
Writes a token to the file.

Parameters:
tok, - The token to write to the file
seeTokenFile 
 public void seeTokenFile()
Displays entire file on output device. Includes line number for each line, and simulates "more" @ 20 lines.

getNextToken 
 public Token getNextToken()
Returns the next token in the open token file.

Returns:
The next token
removeTokenFile 
 public void removeTokenFile()
Get rid of that pesky token file!
